articles.author: Kate Sullivan
articles.title: Biden honors 17 people with the Medal of Freedom - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Thursday awarded the presidential Medal of Freedom to 17 Americans, including Olympic gymnast Simone Biles, former congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords, soccer star Megan Rapinoe and Gold Star father Khizr Khan.
articles.content: President Joe Biden on Thursday awarded the presidential Medal of Freedom to 17 Americans, including Olympic gymnast Simone Biles, former congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords, soccer star Megan Rapinoe a… [+3692 chars]

articles.author: George Ogala
articles.title: Wimbledon: Nadal withdraws due to injury, Kyrgios through to first Grand Slam final - Premium Times
articles.description: The 22-time glam slam winner, despite his injury woes, thrilled spectators with his comeback in a five-set victory over American Taylor Fritz on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Twenty two-time Grand Rafael Nadalhas pulled out of the ongoing Wimbledon Championship due to an “abdominal tear”.
The news came on the Wimbledon Twitter handle.

articles.title: Democrat Khanna hits Biden energy policy, trip to Saudi Arabia: 'It makes no sense' - Fox News
articles.description: Rep. Ro Khanna, D-Calif., reacts to President Biden's latest energy policy moves including American petroleum reserves exports and plans to meet the Saudi crown prince.
articles.content: Rep. Ro Khanna, D-Calif., criticized President Biden for planning to visit the Saudi crown prince Mohammed bin Salman and going back on his campaign promise to make Saudi Arabia a pariah state. On "A… [+1121 chars]

articles.author: Jim Heintz
articles.title: Russian media: Griner pleads guilty in Russia drugs trial - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Russian news agencies say jailed American basketball star Brittney Griner has pleaded guilty to drug possession and smuggling charges during her trial in Moscow.
articles.content:
MOSCOW (AP) Russian news agencies say jailed American basketball star Brittney Griner has pleaded guilty to drug possession and smuggling charges during her trial in Moscow.
